<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Multiplayer Execution

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets the tooltip text associated with the specified tree view path.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvTooltip]] [idc, path]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, path]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - IDC of the tree view control.

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Array containing path numbers.

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - Tooltip text


<comment><!-- START alternative syntax (optional) -->
</comment>
</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> ctrl [[tvTooltip]] path

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] - Array containing path numbers.

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - Tooltip text

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_text = [[tvTooltip]] [101, [0,2]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_text = _treeCtrl [[tvTooltip]] [0,2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSetTooltip]], [[tvAdd]], [[tvClear]], [[tvCollapse]], [[tvCount]], [[tvCurSel]], [[tvData]], [[tvDelete]], [[tvExpand]], [[tvPicture]], [[tvSetCurSel]], [[tvSetData]], [[tvSetPicture]], [[tvSetValue]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[tvText]], [[tvValue]]
</value></part></template>
